General.Name: GCM Resources Plc
General.Description: GCM Resources Plc, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a resource exploration and development company. It primarily engages in the development of the Phulbari coal and power project that relates to thermal coal and semi-soft coking coal located in Northwest Bangladesh. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 3 Bunhill Row, London, United Kingdom, EC1Y 8YZ

1.Name: Mr. Keith Stewart Fulton
1.Title: Fin. Director, Company Sec. & Exec. Director
